title: Mcp-Nodejs-Server
description: MCP Server for Gentoro services, enabling integration of Claude with Gentoro bridges and tools for managing capabilities.
creator: gentoro-GT

GENTORO_API_KEY.description: Your Gentoro API key for authenticating with Gentoro services.

GENTORO_BRIDGE_UID.description: The unique identifier of the defined Gentoro bridge.

GENTORO_BASE_URL.description: The base URL where the Gentoro services are hosted.
